derivation: a reduplicated and prolonged form of a primary ; which occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses);
strongs_def: to fire, i.e. burn (figuratively and passively, become inflamed with fever)
outline:
1. to blow, to burn
  2. to cause to swell, to render timid
  3. to swell, become swollen
    1. of the parts of the body
